original_body_lines: The Ceylon Cold Stores, together with Viridis, launched corporate social responsibility today with a program to recycle plastic  bottles. Ceylon Cold Stores Chairman Daminda Gamlath, Viridis Pvt. Ltd. Chairman Nilantha Gamage, and Secretary Ministry of Environment Dr. Anil Jasinghe were present at the launching ceremony. Pix by Pradeep Dilruskshana
